text: The 2017 UAE Super Cup was the 17th and the 10th Professional UAE Super Cup, held at the Baniyas Stadium, Abu Dhabi on 20 January 2018 between Al Jazira, winners of the 2016–17 UAE Pro-League and Al Wahda, winners of 2017–18 UAE President's Cup. Al Wahda won the game 2–0. ==Details== {| width=92% |- | | |} {| width="100%" |valign="top" width="50%"| {| style="font-size: 90%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" |colspan="4"| |- !width=25| !!width=25| |- |GK ||1 || Mohamed Al Shamsi |- |RB ||2 || Mohamed Barghash |- |CB ||4|| Salem Sultan |- |CB ||12|| Mohammed Salem || || |- |LB ||23|| Rim Changwoo |- |DM ||5|| Mohammad Al Abdulla || || |- |CM ||6 || Sultan Al Ghaferi || |- |CM ||22 || Balázs Dzsudzsák |- |RW ||9|| Mourad Batna |- |LW ||11|| Sebastián Tagliabúe |- |ST ||10 || Ismail Matar (c) || || |- |colspan=3|Substitutes: |- |GK ||50|| Rashed Ali |- |DF ||19|| Khaled Ebraheim || || |- |MF ||7 || Mohamed Al-Shehhi |- |MF ||14|| Khaled Ba Wazir |- |MF ||15|| Nasir Abdelhadi |- |MF ||36|| Ahmed Al Akberi || || |- |FW ||42 || Mohamed Al-Akbari || || |- |colspan=3|Manager: |- |colspan=4| Laurențiu Reghecampf |} |valign="top" width="50%"| {| style="font-size: 90%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" align=center |colspan="4"| |- !width=25| !!width=25| |- |GK ||55 || Ali Khasif (c) || |- |RWB ||2|| Mohamed Fawzi |- |CB ||5|| Musallem Fayez |- |CB ||4|| Mohammed Al-Musalami |- |CB ||44|| Fares Juma |- |LWB ||51|| Khalifa Al Hammadi || || |- |DM ||10 || Mbark Boussoufa || |- |CM ||12 || Salem Rashid Obaid |- |CM ||50|| Mohammed Jamal || |- |CF ||7|| Ali Mabkhout |- |CF ||31|| Romarinho |- |colspan=3|Substitutes: |- |GK ||36|| Khalid Al Senaani |- |DF ||3 || Salem Al Eedi |- |DF ||4 || Mohammed Ali Ayed |- |MF ||15|| Khalfan Mubarak |- |MF ||21|| Yaqoub Al Hosani |- |MF ||23|| Harib Al-Saadi |- |FW ||70|| Ahmed Al Hashmi || || |- |colspan=3|Manager: |- |colspan=4| Henk ten Cate |} |} {| style="width:100%; font-size:90%" | Assistant referees: Sabet Obaid Al Ali Ali Abdulla Al Shehhi Fourth official: Abdulla Mohamed Eshtairy |} ==See also== *2016–17 UAE Pro-League *2016–17 UAE President's Cup ==References== ==External links== UAE Super Cup Category:UAE Super Cup seasons
